news_header: Storm Eowyn hits Ireland and Northern Ireland with devastating winds, causing widespread disruption.
news_text: Storm Eowyn struck parts of Ireland and Northern Ireland with winds exceeding 180 km/h, leading to school and road closures, flight cancellations, and over 560,000 homes without power. A rare nationwide red warning was issued, highlighting life-threatening conditions and potential coastal flooding. Officials warned against travel, citing the storm as an exceptional weather event, and scientists suggested its rapid intensification may be linked to climate change.
